attributes.action: To increase police patrol in North Finchley area after school hours.
attributes.additional_details: The number of incidences reported by the local schools to the parents of school children are on the increase. Some of these incidences are reported to the police as well. Children feel unsafe. Parents feel their children are unsafe.
attributes.background: There has been an increase in reported crime against secondary school children around this area. It mostly occurs after school hours. Having a regular police presence in the area may help tackle this problem.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council and your local police force. 

You could raise this issue with your Police and Crime Commissioner, who is elected, using the following website:

http://www.apccs.police.uk/find-your-pcc/
